sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Row, Col } from 'antd'; class Details extends Component { render() { const { data } = this.props; return (
Principal Amount: ${data.principal.amount} Total Payments {data.numPayments} Months Monthly Installment ${data.monthlyPayment.amount} / month Interest Rate: {data.interestRate * 100} % Net Payable Amount ${data.monthlyPayment.amount * data.numPayments} {/*
Intrest Rate Monthly Payment Num Payments Principal
{data.interestRate * 100}% Amount: {data.monthlyPayment.amount} Currency: {data.monthlyPayment.currency} {data.numPayments}Months Amount: {data.principal.amount} Currency: {data.principal.currency}
*/}
); } } export default Details;
